product_name: Hotronic Custom S4 Heating Elements Foot Warmer Kit
long_description: Keep feet happy and toasty with the Custom S4 Footwarmer kit from Hotronic, designed to charge and spread warmth through compatible insoles for long-lasting comfort in freezing weather.
